name: Ballistic Logistics
description:
Ballistic Logistics is a detective game where the player has to interrogate members of the Motley Crew Circus in order to uncover who is responsible for the death of the Ring Leader.  As the player listens to the testimony of witnesses, they will piece together the narrative and learn who is the true culprit.

Credits:

Ernes Railey

Zac Emerzian
